content.description: Nice setting and just a sick power boulder with the coolest ice "scream" scooped pockets. The traditional version (v11) starts on the lower set of sprag-pockets around head/chest height. There are two other recognized starts: the high stand version (V10) starts on the higher set of better pockets, and the sit-start, called Ice Cream (v12), starts on the ledge down low.

Start on a large shelf way back in the roof.  Climb out on good pockets and pinches, to a tricky move before the lip, (watch the dab here).  Finally pull the crux moves on slightly loose holds over the lip.
content.protection: Lots of pads, both to protect the roof start along with the crux lip finish over a large pit.  With enough spotters and pads this can be pretty safe.
content.location: Head uphill past Animal Acts and look to your right.  Honeycomb Hideout starts under a large boulder and climbs out a roof finishing on the backside.  Descent either reverse the lip moves and jump down or walk across the top and jump off.  Nice to have someone drag a pad over.

content.description: Start sitting in an obvious hueco on good holds and move up and right to small crimps on the rail. Make a few moderate moves on the rail to a big reach right and a hard match. Reset and hit a good hueco. Originally this problem was finished by avoiding the finishing jugs and using small crimps to the left. This variation bumps the difficulty up to V6.
content.location: First problem you get to when you arrive at the Scream area. This is the obvious rail feature on your left.

content.description: Referred to as the slashface of V5.  Start sitting in an obvious hueco on good holds and move up and right to small crimps on the rail.  Make a few moderate moves on the rail to a big reach right and a hard match.  Reset and hit a good hueco then a huge jug.  From here walk up the easy finish.  Originally this problem was finished by avoiding the finishing jugs and using small crimps to the left.  This variation bumps the difficulty up to V6.
content.location: First problem you get to when you arrive at the Scream area.  This is the obvious rail feature on your left.

content.description: This small area hosts the namesake classic Scream V11, and two quality V5's - Animal Acts and Honeycomb Hideout.  There is one other V10 Black Forest and a few low quality moderates.
